org.middleheaven.util
Class StringUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.util.StringUtils
Direct Known Subclasses:
UrlStringUtils
public class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Contains several utility methods when working with Strings.

maybe

public static Maybe<java.lang.String> maybe(java.lang.String value)
Returns an absent Maybe if this#isEmptyOrBlank(CharSequence) returns true, otherwise returns a Maybe with the given string inside.

Parameters:
value - a given String.
